allow: Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import torch; print\(''PyTorch version:'', torch.__version__\); print\(''CUDA available:'', torch.cuda.is_available\(\)\); print\(''CUDA version built with:'', torch.version.cuda\)")
Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import torch; print\(''CUDA available:'', torch.cuda.is_available\(\)\); print\(''Device name:'', torch.cuda.get_device_name\(0\)\)")
